resume.full:
PERSONNEL FILE - VAULT-TEC APPROVED
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

NAME: François RINGLER
POSITION: Senior Software Engineer
CLEARANCE: Level 7
CONTACT: john.doe@email.com

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Highly skilled software engineer with 8+ years of experience in developing robust applications for pre-war technology systems. Specializes in terminal interfaces and vault security protocols. Proven track record in leading development teams and implementing critical infrastructure systems.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
WORK EXPERIENCE
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[Senior Software Engineer]
Atomic Corp | 2020 - Present

Leading development of critical vault systems and terminal interfaces. Implemented security protocols for nuclear facilities. Managed a team of 5 engineers in delivering mission-critical applications for radiation-hardened environments.

Key Achievements:
- Reduced system vulnerabilities by 87%
- Implemented new terminal security protocols
- Led migration to updated vault control systems


[Software Developer]
RobCo Industries | 2017 - 2020

Developed control systems for automated robots and security terminals. Maintained legacy COBOL systems for critical infrastructure. Collaborated with hardware teams to optimize robot response times.

Key Achievements:
- Improved robot response time by 45%
- Maintained 99.9% uptime for security systems
- Modernized legacy codebases


[Junior Developer]
Vault-Tec Corporation | 2015 - 2017

Assisted in development of vault management systems and resource allocation algorithms. Implemented monitoring systems for environmental controls.

Key Achievements:
- Developed resource allocation optimization
- Created automated testing frameworks
- Contributed to vault door control systems

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
TECHNICAL SKILLS
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Terminal Interface Design [█████████░] 9/10
Security Protocols [█████░░░░░] 5/10
COBOL & Fortran [███████░░░] 7/10
Nuclear Systems Management [██████░░░░] 6/10
Robot Control Systems [████████░░] 8/10
Vault-Tec Certified [██████████] 10/10
Radiation Hardened Code [███████░░░] 7/10
Legacy System Maintenance [████████░░] 8/10

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
EDUCATION
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[Master of Science in Computer Science]
Massachusetts Institute of Technology | 2015
Focus: Distributed Systems and Security

[Bachelor of Science in Engineering]
Massachusetts Institute of Technology | 2013
Focus: Computer Engineering

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
PERSONAL INTERESTS
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

* Collecting pre-war holotapes
* Terminal hacking competitions
* Maintaining vintage computers
* Nuka-Cola bottle cap collecting
* Reading technical manuals

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
END OF FILE
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
